     - Do not use fumigant sprays or fogs; they are not necessary to control pubic (""crab"") lice and can be toxic if inhaled or absorbed through the skin.
    
    
Persons with pubic lice should be examined and treated for any other sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) that may be present.",CDC,"Parasites - Lice - Pubic ""Crab"" Lice"
